Sentencas: Development of high-performance electrode materials is critical to the commercial realization of solid oxide fuel-cell (SOFC) technology.
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The material development process is, however, very complex and requires understanding of the fundamental issues of the materials and the electrochemistry that is involved.
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An interesting example is the (La,Sr)MnO(3) (LSM) cathode material.
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper discusses some important issues in the development and optimization of LSM cathode materials for SOFCs.
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The relationship between the microstructure, interfacial properties and the electrochemical behaviour of the cathode material is not a static one.
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Rather, it changes and evolves constantly under fuel-cell operation conditions.
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Such dynamic relationship between the properties and the electrochemical behaviour is important for the fundamental understanding of the mechanism and kinetics of the oxygen reduction at LSM cathodes, and for the development of high-performance cathodes for SOFCs that operate at intermediate temperatures (600-800 degreesC).
Titulo: Issues on development of (La,Sr)MnO3 cathode for solid oxide fuel cells
